fields.name: Chaotic
fields.description: Chaotic characters align themselves with destruction, ambition, and wickedness. Chaotic characters adopt a “survival of the fittest” mentality.

fields.name: Lawful
fields.description: Lawful characters align themselves with fairness, order, and virtue. Lawful characters operate from a “good of the whole” mentality.

fields.name: Neutral
fields.description: Neutral characters find balance between Law and Chaos. They align with the cycle of growth and decline, adopting a “nature must take its course” mentality.
